unnormalised: State budgets, like Karnataka's, reflect priorities. Allocations to education, say for IIT-Dharwad, impact future skills. A substantial health budget can address issues like TB prevalence. Infrastructure spending, think 5000 km of rural roads, affects connectivity. Social schemes like MGNREGA get funding. Managing fiscal deficit is key, especially during festivals like Onam when spending rises. Remember, biryani isn't just food; it's a symbol of shared resources!
normalised: State budgets, like Karnataka's, reflect priorities. Allocations to education, say for I I T-Dharwad, impact future skills. A substantial health budget can address issues like T B prevalence. Infrastructure spending, think five thousand kilometer of rural roads, affects connectivity. Social schemes like M G N R E G A get funding. Managing fiscal deficit is key, especially during festivals like Onam when spending rises. Remember, biryani isn't just food; it's a symbol of shared resources!
